exceptions.exn: In environment A : Set A0, A1 : A eqA : A -> A -> Prop plusA : A -> A -> A invA : A -> A minusA, multA : A -> A -> A divA : A -> forall b : A, (eqA b A0 -> False) -> A cs : CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {eqA a b -> False} n : nat ltM : mon n -> mon n -> Prop ltM_dec : forall a b : mon n, {ltM a b} + {ltM b a} + {a = b} os : OrderStructure (mon n) (zero_mon n) ltM (mult_mon n) aP, R, Q : list (poly A0 eqA ltM) a, b : poly A0 eqA ltM H : BuchAux.zerop A A0 eqA n ltM a -> False H0 : BuchAux.zerop A A0 eqA n ltM b -> False H1 : In b aP Unable to unify "In b aP" with "divp A A0 eqA multA divA n ltM (ppcp A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA cs n ltM a b) (spolyp A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA cs eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec os a b)".
